thread.title: BREAKING: Police scrambled as 'screaming man makes bomb threat inside Trump Tower'
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Police scrambled as 'screaming man makes bomb threat inside Trump Tower'

title: BREAKING: Police scrambled as 'screaming man makes bomb threat inside Trump Tower'
text:
DS THREAT: Police and sniffer dogs are on the scene 
Police have scambled to Trump International Hotel and Tower to reports of a "disturbance call" inside the building. 
Stunned eyewitnesses claim a "screaming" man threatened to detonate a bomb as horrified guests watched on. 
Pictures show Chicago police armed with sniffer dogs outside the building at around 1.45pm GMT (7.45 UK time). Inside Trump Tower Thursday, 17th November 2016 Trump Tower serves as the headquarters for The Trump Organization and houses the primary penthouse condominium residence of Donald Trump. The building broke ground in 1979, with the atrium, apartments, offices, and stores, Including a Starbucks. 1 / 10 Getty Images New York City shoppers and visitors walk past the entrance to Trump Tower on Fifth Avenue 
GOOGLE DISTURBANCE: Eyewitnesses claim a screaming man threatened to detonate a bomb 
Police are yet to confirm a bomb threat has been made. 
A resident was told by hotel staff that a man has been taken into custody, DNAinfo reports. 
MORE TO FOLLOW Related articles
